summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Silwer Lining Photography website MVP. All core functionality working perfectly including booking flow, admin dashboard, and API endpoints.

design_issues.issue: HTML validation warnings in admin dashboard - span elements inside tbody causing hydration errors

passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, services, featured work, testimonials
Portfolio page with category filtering (maternity, newborn, family, individual)
Pricing page with package tabs and add-ons section
Contact form submission with success confirmation
Complete booking flow - session selection, date/time picking, contact details, confirmation
Admin dashboard navigation (bookings, portfolio, testimonials, messages)
